lines.text: How do you keep smiling with a stiff upper lip?

[on learning he has weeks to live]
When you come to think of it it's a bit thick isn't it?
The bank will be happy to advise you on investments
I'm not going to invest it - I'm going to spend it.
Oh, I wouldn't do that if I were you.
Oh, yes you would, even you.
They try to be sane in a mad world whereas when I was a gal, we tried to be mad in a sane world. So much more satisfying.
Do you know who I am? Sir Trevor Lampington. Who discovered Lampington's Disease. And if you've got Lampington's Disease, I'm a dancer in the Sadlers Wells ballet!
I want some more information from you Mr Bird - tomorrow perhaps. Don't run away or drop dead, will you?
